title: Xiaomi confirms large battery, 50 MP camera, and fast charging for affordable Poco C85 5G
description: The Poco C85 5G is about to become a new budget addition in the company's lineup. A few days ahead of the launch, Xiaomi has shared some core specs of the device, and it seems that the device will be a rebrand of the Redmi 15C 5G.
content: Xiaomi is gearing up to launch a new affordable phone under the Poco branding, the C85 5G. The launch is set for December 9, 2025, which is around the corner. Ahead of this imminent release, the comp… [+1388 chars]
